---
applyTo: '**/*vue'
---
# Instructions for Code generation
The framework used for the project is Vue.js. The code should be written in TypeScript and follow the Vue.js coding standards.
The library used for styling is Tailwind CSS.

# styling
the style is global and defined in "/front/src/assets/style.css" don't create new style files or classes if the style exists in the global style file.
the style for positioning and layout should be done using Tailwind CSS classes, the file "/front/src/assets/responsive.css" contains the positioning style.
